GmlRecorder

public GmlRecorder(Vec3D screen,
                   float minStrokeLength,
                   float minPointsDistance)
Creates a new GmlRecorder using the given screen size, minimum stroke length and minimum points distance

Parameters:
screen - - Vec3D (srceen dimensions)
minStrokeLength - - int (minimum length of the stroke)
minPointsDistance - - flaot (minimum distance between two points of the same stroke)

Method Detail

setClient

public void setClient(GmlClient client)
Sets the client information to be used. Overrides the default values

Parameters:
client - - GmlClient

setMinStrokeLength

public void setMinStrokeLength(float length)
Sets the min stroke length. If smaller, a stroke won't be added

Parameters:
length - - float

setMinPointsDistance

public void setMinPointsDistance(float distance)
Sets the min points distance. If below, a point won't be added Used to minimise the number of points

Parameters:
distance - - float

clear

public void clear()
Clears strokes, including those under recording

beginStroke

public void beginStroke(int sessionID)
Begins the recording of a new GmlStroke
Note: you must keep track of the sessionID and use the same ID to end the stroke
otherwise the stroke won't be added to the gml.

Parameters:
sessionID - - int

beginStroke

public void beginStroke(int sessionID,
                        int layer)
Begins the recording of a new GmlStroke
Note: you must keep track of the sessionID and use the same ID to end the stroke
otherwise the stroke won't be added to the gml.

Parameters:
sessionID - - int
layer - - int

beginStroke

public void beginStroke(int sessionID,
                        int layer,
                        GmlBrush brush)
Begins the recording of a new GmlStroke
Note: you must keep track of the sessionID and use the same ID to end the stroke
otherwise the stroke won't be added to the gml.

Parameters:
sessionID - - int
layer - - int
brush - - GmlBrush

addPoint

public void addPoint(int sessionID,
                     Vec3D v)
Adds a new point to a stroke The point's coordinates shall be within 0-1 on every axis. They'll be scaled automatically according to the screen's ratio

Parameters:
sessionID - - int
v - - Vec3D vetor (shall be within AABB (0,0,0) -> (1,1,1))

addPoint

public void addPoint(int sessionID,
                     Vec3D v,
                     float time)
Adds a new point to a stroke The point's coordinates shall be within 0-1 on every axis. They'll be scaled automatically according to the screen's ratio

Parameters:
sessionID - - int
v - - Vec3D vetor (shall be within AABB (0,0,0) -> (1,1,1))
time - - float

addPoint

public void addPoint(int sessionID,
                     Vec3D v,
                     float time,
                     float pressure,
                     Vec3D rotation,
                     Vec3D direction)
Adds a new point to a stroke The point's coordinates shall be within 0-1 on every axis. They'll be scaled automatically according to the screen's ratio

Parameters:
sessionID - - int
v - - Vec3D vetor (shall be within AABB (0,0,0) -> (1,1,1))
